A controller account should not be set t: 控制账户不应设置为管理多个资金账户。 所选的控制账户已经在控制{{stashId}}
A controller account should not map to a: 控制账户不应同时为其他资金账户。 此选定的控制账户是一个资金账户，由{{bondedId}}控制
Active with {{blocks}} blocks authored{{: Active with {{blocks}} blocks authored{{hasMessage}} heartbeat message
After setting a lock limit, you will rec: 设置锁定期限后，您将获得额外的 {{KTON}} 奖励。如您在锁定期限内提前取出，需要提现3倍的 {{KTON}} 罚款。
All the listed validators and all their: All the listed validators and all their nominators will receive their rewards.
Amount taken up-front from the reward by: 确认之前从奖励中预先提取的金额，然后将剩余部分分配给自己和提名人
Amount to add to the currently bonded fu: 当前质押金额的总量. 使用帐户中的可用资金进行调整.
Amount to add to the currently deposit f: 将冻结资产转换为锁定资产的数量
Any account can request payout for stake: Any account can request payout for stakers, this is not limited to accounts that will be rewarded.
Changing the key only takes effect at th: 更改密钥仅在下一个会话开始时生效。 如果验证，则应该（当前）使用ed25519密钥。
Changing the key only takes effect at the start of the next session. The input here is generates from the author_rotateKeys command
Deposit more funds: 为已质押资产设置锁定期限
Display overview information for the sel: Display overview information for the selected validator, including blocks produced.
Filter available candidates based on nam: Filter available candidates based on name, address or short account index.
For fund security, your session key shou: 为了资金安全，您的会话密钥应资金密钥不匹配。
No fixed term (Set a lock period will ge: 不冻结 (设置冻结期限将获得额外的KTON奖励)
Note: Please keep a little {{ring}} as f: Note: Please keep a little {{ring}} as fee
Note: Please keep a little {{token}} as: 注意：请保留少许的{{token}}作为交易手续费
POWER = your stake / total stake: POWER = 你的质押 / 总质押
Ranking is done of the estimated best re: Ranking is done of the estimated best return, taking the commission and total bonded amount into account. It does not incorporate validator liveliness according to length of operation nor number of blocks produced.
Show only elected for next session: Show only elected for next session
Stash account (do not increase the amoun: 资金账户 (收益不质押，放入余额)
Stash account (increase the amount at st: 资金账户 (收益直接质押)
存放要指定的帐户。 块奖励在验证者和提名者之间分配
The amount of funds to unbond, this is a: The amount of funds to unbond, this is adjusted using the bonded funds on the stash account.
The amount that will be used on a per-va: 将基于每个验证者计算该验证者的奖励的金额。
The controller is the account that is be: 控制账户是用于控制任何提名或验证操作的帐户。 我将签署此交易。控制账户是用于控制任何提名或验证操作的帐户。 我将签署此交易。
The controller is the account that will: 控制账户是将用于控制任何提名或验证操作的帐户。 不应与其他资金账户或控制器匹配。
The destination account for any payments: 作为提名人或验证人的任何付款的目标帐户
The number of time this validator can ge: 在自动取消质押之前，可以大幅减少该验证器的时间（最多允许10个）
The percentage reward (0-100) that shoul: 验证者应采用的百分比奖励（0-100）
The specified value is greater than your: The specified value is greater than your free balance. The node will bond the maximum amount available.
The total amount of the stash balance th: 在即将到来的各回合中将受到威胁的隐藏余额的总量（应小于可用总量）
There are {{payoutsAmount}} unclaimed re: 当前未领取的奖金有{{payoutsAmount}}笔，每次交易领取最大限额为{{payoutMaxAmount}}笔。您需要至少{{tx}}次操作，来领取全部奖金
There is currently an ongoing election f: 目前，正在进行新的验证人候选人选举。 因此，不允许进行质押等操作。
This operation will submit the seed via: This operation will submit the seed via an RPC call. Do not perform this operation on a public RPC node, but ensure that the node is local, connected to your validator and secure.
Warning - Changing the controller while: 警告-验证时更改控制账户将修改关联的session帐户。 建议更改控制账户之前停止验证。
Your nomination will take effect in the: 您的提名将在下一个era生效，在此之前，POWER有可能展示为0
automatic unstake threshold: 自动取消验证漏块数阈值
available: The amount of tokens that are: 可用的: 当前可以操作的 token 数量，可用于质押、交易、转账等。
block hash or number to query: 要查询的区块哈希或块高
bonded: The amount of tokens that cannot: 冻结: 无法直接操作但无锁定期限的的 token 数量，用于获取 power，可以随时取出（需要14天等待期限）或添加锁定期限。
locked: The amount of tokens that cannot: 锁定: 无法直接操作的 token 且有锁定期限的 token 数量，用于获取投票权，锁定也可以获得额外的{{KTON}}收益。
unbonding: The amount of tokens that has: 解冻中: 已选择取出但在等待期限的 token。
